mapper.select: SELECT u.idUsers,u.userName,u.passwords,u.startedDate,u.typeUser,s.description FROM users u INNER JOIN status s on u.idStatus = s.idStatus order by u.idUsers
SELECT u.idUsers,u.userName,u.passwords,u.startedDate,u.typeUser,s.description FROM users u INNER JOIN status s on u.idStatus = s.idStatus WHERE u.idUsers = #{idUsers} order by u.idUsers
